forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. High 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early. Then a mix of wintry precipitation expected late. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with a wintry mix expected to move in later at night. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
